data.title: Sweet Kaaram Coffee Trailer: Three Generations Of Women Embark On A Journey Of Self Discovery
data.meta_description: The web series is all set to stream on Amazon Prime Video on July 6
data.text:
The trailer of Sweet Kaaram Coffee, the upcoming series starring Lakshmi, Madhoo, and Santhy Balakrihnan in the lead roles, was released by the makers on social media on June 30. The trailer shows three women from different generations of a family going on a journey of self-discovery. An elderly woman (Lakshmi) wants a break from her overprotective son; a homemaker (Madhoo) who is distressed with her routine; and a young woman (Santhy) who is on the lookout for an understanding partner go on a trip, leaving everything behind.

The series also features Kavin Jay Babu, Vamsi Krishna, Samyuktha Vishwanathan, Bala Suresh, and Ganesh Venkatraman. Directed by Bejoy Nambiar, Swathi Raghuraman, and Krishna Marimuthu, the show is produced by Reshma Ghatala, who is known for her collaborations with Gautam Vasudev Menon on Neethane En Ponvasantham (2012), Enai Noki Paayum Thota (2019), and Ram's Thanga Meengal (2015). Govind Vasantha of 96 (2018) fame provides music for the entire series. The series will premiere on July 6 and will be available for streaming in Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Malayalam, and Hindi languages on Amazon Prime Video.
